CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '1' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = '', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '1' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'a', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '1' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'b', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '1' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'c', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '1' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'd', 'A', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '1' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'e', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '1' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'f', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '2' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = '', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '2' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'a', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '2' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'b', 'A', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '3' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = '', 'A', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '3' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'a', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '3' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'b', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '3' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'c', 'C', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '3' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = 'd', 'A', IF(TEXT(Vertical__c) = '4' && TEXT(Sub_vertical__c) = '', 'A', 'Please choose valid Vertical and Sub vertical combination.'))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Comp Package/Code
